entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear overnight. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
